page.title: 02SMALLEY. HOUSING.
page.content: {SMALLEY.} Smalley is a linear village which has grown up along the Derby to Heanor road (A 608) at the junction of the road to Kilburn. The houses are mostly spread along each side of the main road with fields beyond. {HOUSING. We found there were four types of housing. 1)old terraces of cottages built of brick 2)larger semi-detached or detached houses built probably in the twentieth century of brick and stucco 3)a small estate of council houses at the north end of the village, all built of brick 4)a modern development of semi-detached and detached houses and bungalows at the south end of the village, of brick and stone.
